From: "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@...>

(Jason Lind, didn't you say you were going to leave?)

(By the way everybody...the battle is not over.  Are all the Maximals 
blind?!  There's a 45 foot tall gestalt opening fire on the Ark, and 
a nice sized cache of Predacons opening fire on the Ark and the 
Maxis!  It's far from over)



Oblitertron/Punch/BH/Blastrage/Zergling/Ramhorn/Oinker/Unitron:



Ramhorn saw the door/hatch open after he had saw a very large dent in 
it appear suddenly.  "Uh...maybe that wasn't such a good idea." he 
said, seeing Oblitertron's large crimson optics seem to pierce 
through him.

Ramhorn slowly stepped out of the Ark, Oblitertron's optics 
following.  Ramhorn raised his sub machine gun, firing off 20 sonic 
shells at Cutthroat's chest.

---

Oblitertron raised his left palm to aim at Ramhorn.  Getting it so it 
would hit him in the back, he was about to fire, but a missile 
knocked his arm a little ways off, firing off a missile from his palm 
at the middle of the Terrorcons.

---

BH and Blastrage watched Oblitertron fire on the Terrorcons.

"I...think it's time for that tactical retreat..."

"Uh..yeah." Blastrage said, firing off three grenades at the Ark from 
the mounted grenade launcher, the skimmer slowly leaving the 
battlefield, still aiming the grenade launcher to provide cover fire.

---

Unitron looked around for someone too shoot, seeing a go for the 
Terrorcons.  "Blast it! Incompitent gestalt!" he didn't have his 
weapons pointed at the Terrorcons, but he had a feeling he may have 
too.

-------
Oinker fired off three laser bolts at the Ark.

---

Punch ducked under the laser blasts, one of them singing his left 
shoulder.  He returned fire with three laser bolts at Archangel.

---

Zergling fired off 20 rapid laser bolts at Archangel's abdomen.
